languages.text: {n}Из сломанного носа течет кровь.{/n} "Не смею отказывать Вашей Светлости. Подозреваю, что у вас еще полно столь же веских аргументов".
{n}Blood streams from his broken nose.{/n} "I would not dare to refuse Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I suspect you have many more equally compelling arguments up your sleeve."
languages.original_text: {n}Из сломанного носа течет кровь.{/n} "Не смею отказывать Вашей Светлости. Подозреваю, что у вас еще полно столь же веских аргументов".

languages.text: {n}鲜血从他被打断的鼻子里流了出来。{/n}“我不敢拒绝您的请求，大人。我担心您还有很多同样有力的理由在等着我。”
languages.original_text: {n}Blood streams from his broken nose.{/n} "I would not dare to refuse Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I suspect you have many more equally compelling arguments up your sleeve."

traits.locale_text: {n}鲜血从他被打断的鼻子里流了出来。{/n}“我不敢拒绝您的请求，大人。我担心您还有很多同样有力的理由在等着我。”
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}折れた鼻から血が流れる。{/n}「私には陛下を拒む勇気はありません。あなたには同じように説得力のある言い分がもっとたくさんあるのでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Blood streams from his broken nose.{/n} "I would not dare to refuse Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I suspect you have many more equally compelling arguments up your sleeve."

traits.locale_text: {n}折れた鼻から血が流れる。{/n}「私には陛下を拒む勇気はありません。あなたには同じように説得力のある言い分がもっとたくさんあるのでしょう」
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}De su nariz rota fluye un riachuelo de sangre.{/n} «No me atrevería a negarle nada, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Tengo la impresión de que esconde numerosos argumentos igual de contundentes en la manga».
languages.original_text: {n}Blood streams from his broken nose.{/n} "I would not dare to refuse Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I suspect you have many more equally compelling arguments up your sleeve."

traits.locale_text: {n}De su nariz rota fluye un riachuelo de sangre.{/n} «No me atrevería a negarle nada, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Tengo la impresión de que esconde numerosos argumentos igual de contundentes en la manga».
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Son nez cassé saigne abondamment.{/n} « Jamais je n'oserais désobéir à Votre Seigneurie. Je vous soupçonne d'avoir bien d'autres arguments convaincants cachés dans votre manche. »
languages.original_text: {n}Blood streams from his broken nose.{/n} "I would not dare to refuse Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I suspect you have many more equally compelling arguments up your sleeve."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son nez cassé saigne abondamment.{/n} « Jamais je n'oserais désobéir à Votre Seigneurie. Je vous soupçonne d'avoir bien d'autres arguments convaincants cachés dans votre manche. »
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Aus seiner gebrochenen Nase strömt Blut.{/n} "Ich würde es nicht wagen, mich Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} zu widersetzen. Ich nehme an, Ihr habt noch viele weitere überzeugende Argumente im Ärmel."
languages.original_text: {n}Blood streams from his broken nose.{/n} "I would not dare to refuse Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I suspect you have many more equally compelling arguments up your sleeve."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus seiner gebrochenen Nase strömt Blut.{/n} "Ich würde es nicht wagen, mich Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} zu widersetzen. Ich nehme an, Ihr habt noch viele weitere überzeugende Argumente im Ärmel."
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Kırılmış burnundan kanlar akıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne karşı gelmeye cüret edemem. Eminim elinin altında eşit derecede ikna edici daha birçok argüman vardır."
languages.original_text: {n}Blood streams from his broken nose.{/n} "I would not dare to refuse Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I suspect you have many more equally compelling arguments up your sleeve."
